Detailed Description

This class contains the common properties for the shadows.

void ShadowCasterCommon::init ( DataSectionPtr  pConfigSection  ) 

This method inits the common properties used by the shadows from a xml section.

Parameters:
pConfigSection the root section to read the properties from (ie engine_config.xml)
